;+ ; Function test_energyphoton ;- function test_energyphoton,verbose=verbose if n_elements(verbose) ne 1 then verbose=1 epsilon=1E-23 answer=(1.07375E-18) FE='(E10.4)' energy=get_energyperphoton(185.0,/wave_in_nm) pass1=(abs(energy-answer) le epsilon) spass1=(pass1 ? 'PASSED' : 'FAILED') message,/info,'Energy Test 1 '+string1f(energy,format=FE)+' J : '+spass1 energym=get_energyperphoton(nm_to_m(185),wave_in_nm=0) pass2=(abs(energym-answer) le epsilon) spass2=(pass2 ? 'PASSED' : 'FAILED') message,/info,'Energy Test 2 '+string1f(energym,format=FE)+' J : '+spass2 message,/info,'Answer should be '+string1f(answer,format=FE)+' J' success=(pass1 and pass2) message,/info,(success eq 1 ? 'SUCCESS' : 'FAILED') return,success end
